    • Method Detail

      • load

        public void load(Loader.PercentDone percentDone)
        Initialize, updating the percentDone variable when necessary.

      • onLoad

        public void onLoad()
        Called after everything has been loaded

      • onPause

        public void onPause()
        Called when the application is about to be paused.

      • onResume

        public void onResume()
        Called when the application is about to be resumed.

      • createLayers

        protected abstract Layer[] createLayers()
        Called on loading. Returns the created layers for this scene in order such that element 0 in the array corresponds to the layer most in the background

      • loadEventDFA

        protected abstract DFA<Scene.SceneState,Scene.SceneEvent> loadEventDFA()
        Called on loading. Returns a DFA determing the current GameEvent of the scene.

      • step

        public void step(long deltaTime,
        java.util.ArrayList<android.view.MotionEvent> inputEvents)

      • updateStart

        protected void updateStart()
        First method called in game loop. Sets the current state and then calls Layer.onUpdateStart() for each layer in this scene.

      • processInputEvents

        protected void processInputEvents(java.util.ArrayList<android.view.MotionEvent> inputEvents)

      • handleInputEvent

        protected void handleInputEvent(android.view.MotionEvent motionEvent,
                    Sprite handlingSprite)
        Method called after the given motionEvent was processed.
        Parameters:
        motionEvent - The motion event that occurred.
        handlingSprite - The sprite that handled the given event. null if it was not handled.

      • onEnter

        protected void onEnter(long deltaTime,
           Scene.SceneState state)
        Called just before updating all layers held by this scene and just after processing input events and calling updateStart and calling the start functions.
        Parameters:
        deltaTime - The time since the last update.
        state - The current state of the scene.

      • onExit

        protected void onExit(long deltaTime,
          Scene.SceneState state)
        Called just after updating all layers held by this scene and just before ending the update.
        Parameters:
        deltaTime - The time since the last update.
        state - The current state of the scene.

      • updateFinish

        protected void updateFinish()
        Last method called in game loop. Steps the state and deals with each sprite's renderable.

      • setSceneEvent

        public void setSceneEvent(Scene.SceneEvent sceneEvent)
        Sets the scene event for this loop

      • requestSprite

        public Sprite requestSprite(java.lang.String name)
        Request the sprite with the given name.

      • requestLayer

        public Layer requestLayer(java.lang.String name)
        Request the layer with the given name.
